segments.text: Did you notice that stop sign you ran through ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , I didn't even notice it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I honestly couldn't see it because of the bushes growing over it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . Those bushes are a problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I swear that I didn't mean to run it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can understand why you didn't stop for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you going to give me a ticket today , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Under the circumstances , I think I'm just going to let you go with a warning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Next time , just pay closer attention .
segments.speaker: S2
